name: Wine Country Trattoria
location: Disney California Adventure Park, Performance Corridor

items.title: Soup Del Giorno
items.description: Chefs' selection of Seasonal Ingredients

items.title: Fried Calamari
items.description: Lightly-breaded Calamari and Haricots Vert served with Pepperoncini Aïoli

items.title: Pull-Apart Cheese Bread
items.description: Sun-dried Tomato Focaccia, Whipped Herb Ricotta, Mozzarella, Tomato Coulis and Micro Herbs

items.title: Wine Country Trattoria Salad with Shrimp
items.description: Greens with Pears, Candied Walnuts, Pickled Red Onions, Whipped Feta, Endive and Pear Vinaigrette

items.title: Hearty Short Rib Pasta
items.description: Served with Broccolini, Caramelized Onions, Mushrooms, Rich Creamy Sauce and Pappardelle Pasta

items.title: Rib-Eye Steak*
items.description: Ribeye with Mascarpone Roasted Garlic Mashed Potatoes, Glazed Baby Carrots and Porcini Mushroom Demi Sauce

items.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
items.description: A rich Ragù of Beef, Italian Sausage, Tomatoes, and Seasonings

items.title: Shrimp Alfredo
items.description: creamy Mushroom Alfredo sauce with Parsley, Garlic and Chili flakes

items.title: Chicken Parmesan
items.description: Breaded and Fried Chicken Breast with Tomato Sauce and Mozzarella served over Spaghetti

items.title: Salmon
items.description: Creamy Roasted Red Bell Pepper Polenta and Roasted Seasonal Vegetables with a Lemon-Parsley Aïoli

items.title: Spaghetti Aglio Olio
items.description: Lightly tossed with Seasonal Vegetables, Garlic, Chili Flakes, and Lemon Oil

items.title: Tomato Salad
items.description: Citrus-marinated Tomatoes, Housemade Ricotta, Pesto, crispy Basil and Watercress

items.title: Lemon-Berry Tart
items.description: Lemon Berry Tart with Pistachio Crumble

items.title: Chicken Breast
items.description: served with choice of two (2) Selections and choice of Small Lowfat Milk or Small DASANI® Water

items.title: Whole-Grain Pasta with Marinara and Meatballs
items.description: served with choice of two (2) Selections and choice of Small Lowfat Milk or Small DASANI® Water

items.description: served with choice of two (2) Selections and choice of Small Lowfat Milk or Small DASANI® Water

items.title: Cheese Pizza
items.description: served with choice of two (2) Selections and choice of Small Lowfat Milk or Small DASANI® Water

items.title: Assorted Twinings of London® Hot Teas
Fountain Beverages
items.description: Coca-Cola®, Diet Coke®, Coca-Cola® Zero Sugar, Sprite®, Fanta® Orange, Minute Maid® Zero Sugar Pomegranate Lemonade, and Freshly Brewed Iced Tea

items.title: Aperol Spritz
items.description: Aperol and La Marca Prosecco topped with Soda Water

items.title: Garibaldi
items.description: Aperol and Blood Orange Juice

items.title: Italian Margarita
items.description: 1800 Silver Tequila, Lime Juice, Sweet-and-Sour and a floater of Disaronno Amareto

items.title: Trattoria Old Fashioned
items.description: Bulleit Rye Bourbon, Rosemary Reduction, Bitters and Club Soda

items.title: Passion Fruit Mule
items.description: Tito's Handmade Vodka, Lime Juice, Ginger Beer and Passion Fruit Liqueur

items.title: Amaro Rinfrescante
items.description: Amaro Averna Liqueur topped with Sparkling Mineral Water and a splash of Lemon Juice

items.title: Trattoria Aperitivo
items.description: Cappelletti Aperitivo, Storyhouse California Dry Gin and Lemon Juice

items.title: Frozen Limoncello
items.description: Meletti Limoncello, Sweet-and-Sour and Lemonade

items.title: Lemon Basil Spritz
items.description: Limoncello, Absolut Citron, Prosecco, Lemon Juice, and Fresh Basil

items.title: Pineapple Crush
items.description: Hendricks Gin, Captain Morgan, Orgeat, Passionfruit, Pineapple Juice, Lemon

items.title: Prickly Pear Mojito
items.description: Bacardi Rum, Peach Schnapps, Prickly Pear, Agave, Lime Juice, Soda Water

items.title: Red Sangria
items.description: Beso Del Sol Red Sangria made from 100% natural marriage of Spanish Tempranillo Grapes, Orange, Blood Orange, and Lemon Juices with a touch of Natural Cinnamon

items.title: White Sangria
items.description: Beso Del Sol White Sangria made from 100% natural blend of Airen White Spanish Grapes, Lemon, Peach, and Mango Juices

items.title: Peroni
items.description: Italian Pale Lager, Rome, Italy (5% ABV)

items.title: North Coast PranQster
items.description: Fort Bragg, CA (ABV 7.6%)

items.title: Brewery X, Watermelon Lime Hard Seltzer
items.description: Anaheim, CA (5.0% ABV), 12oz serving

items.title: Corona
items.description: Mexican Lager, Mexico City (4.5% ABV, 22 IBU)

items.title: Seasonal ACE Hard Cider
items.description: Sebastopol, CA (ABV 5.0-6.9%)

items.title: Athletic Brewing, Run Wild Non-Alcoholic IPA (ABV <0.5%)
Wine Flight - Tour of Italy
items.description: Placido Pinot Grigio, Veneto; Giovanni Rosso Barolo, Piedmont; Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva

items.title: Wine Flight - California Wine Country
items.description: Honig Vineyards Sauvignon Blanc, Napa Valley; MacMurray Estate Vineyards Pinot Noir, Russian River Valley; Schweiger Family Cabernet Sauvignon, Spring Mountain District

Chalk Hill, Sauvignon Blanc, Sonoma County
Michele Chiarlo Nivole Moscato, Italy
items.description: a delicate dessert wine, light and soft on the palate with a fragrant, fruity bouquet and a clean, crisp finish (3-oz pour)

items.title: MacMurray Estate, Pinot Noir, Sonoma Coast
Beaulieu Vineyards, Cabernet Sauvignon, Napa Valley
Schweiger Family, Cabernet Sauvignon, Spring Mountain District
Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva, DOCG Red Blend, Italy

items.description: Piedmonte, Italy

items.title: Guests must speak to a Cast Member about their allergy-friendly request
Fried Calamari
items.description: Lightly breaded Calamari and Haricots Verts served with Pepperoncini Aïoli. (For Peanut/Tree Nut and Sesame Allergies)

items.title: Pull-Apart Cheese Bread
items.description: Sun-dried Tomato Focaccia, Whipped Herb Ricotta, Mozzarella, Tomato Coulis and Micro Herbs. (For Egg, Fish/Shellfish, Sesame and Soy Allergies)

items.title: Guests must speak to a Cast Member about their allergy-friendly request

items.description: with Mascarpone Roasted Garlic Mashed Potatoes, Glazed Baby Carrots and Porcini Mushroom Demi Sauce. (For Gluten/Wheat, Egg, Fish/Shellfish, Peanut/Tree Nut, Sesame and Soy Allergies)

items.description: A rich Ragu of Beef, Italian Sausage, Vegetables and Seasonings (For Gluten/Wheat, Egg, Fish/Shellfish, Peanut/Tree Nut and Sesame Allergies)

items.title: Shrimp Alfredo**
items.description: a creamy White Wine Sauce, Parsley, Garlic and Chili Flakes. (For Gluten/Wheat, Egg, Peanut/Tree Nut, Sesame and Soy Allergies)

items.title: Hearty Short Rib Pasta
items.description: served with Broccolini, Caramelized Onions, Mushrooms, Rich Creamy Sauce and Pappardelle Pasta (For Fish/Shellfish, Peanut/Tree Nut and Sesame Allergies)

items.description: Mixed Greens, Tomato, Fresh Strawberries, Carrot Ribbons, Crispy Artichokes, Roasted Beet Mascarpone Spread and Champagne Vinaigrette. (For Egg, Fish, Peanut/Tree Nut and Sesame Allergies)

items.description: Creamy Roasted Red Bell Pepper Polenta and Roasted Seasonal Vegetables with a Lemon-Parsley Aïoli. (For Peanut/Tree Nut, Sesame and Shellfish Allergies)

items.description: Breaded and Fried Chicken Breast with Tomato Sauce and Mozzarella served over Spaghetti. (For Peanut/Tree Nut and Sesame Allergies)

Tomato Salad
items.description: Citrus-marinated Tomatoes, House-made Ricotta, Pesto, Basil and Watercress with Sourdough Croutons. (For Egg, Fish/Shellfish, Milk, Sesame and Soy Allergies)

items.description: Lightly tossed with Seasonal Vegetables, Garlic, Chili Flakes and Olive Oil-White Wine Sauce. (For Gluten/Wheat, Egg, Fish/Shellfish, Milk, Peanut/Tree Nut, Sesame and Soy Allergies)
